feed.title: Proposing a P2QRH BIP towards a quantum resistant soft fork

entry.title: Proposing a P2QRH BIP towards a quantum resistant soft fork
entry.summary: The document referenced is an evolving piece of work that has undergone multiple revisions beyond its initial posting. The latest version of this document can be found on GitHub, providing insight into the continuous development and updates it has received. For those interested in accessing the most current iteration, it is available at [this link](https://github.com/cryptoquick/bips/blob/e1fa27cb25deee8d58bdb9a64c112dfdf09e216d/bip-p2qrh.mediawiki). This signifies the dynamic nature of the work, underscoring the importance of consulting the latest version for the most up-to-date information.
